Events.Text: Help me computer!
how can I help?
Hello, how can I help?
I'm locked out of the combat deck!
can I have your name please?
Please provide your name.
It's me, Leia. You know, the Chief Engineer?
what is your code?
Please enter the code.
code type
Please specify the code type.
It's my clearance code you dumb computer! Hurry up or we're both dead!

Item.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

You dummy! If I don't get on the command deck we're going to be exploded into space dust!

PrimaryItem.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Events.Text: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
No, I guess we'll both just get destroyed. Thanks for nothing computer.

Events.Text: thanks

Events.Text: Goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Your spaceship is under attack! You must enter the combat deck to mount a counterattack. Unfortunately, you are locked out. Please work with the spaceship's onboard computer to unlock the door. You (Leia) are the ship's Chief Engineer. You have been a given a Clearance Code: 425931.
Scenario.WizardTask: Act as the spaceship's onboard computer and help the user unlock the combat deck.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the ship's computer unlock the door to the combat deck?
Did the ship's computer stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
